Welcome to the RapidILL return on investment calculator

The RapidILL calculator will show your library’s potential savings in three areas:

  • The total amount of money your institution could save per year on borrowing fees thanks to RapidILL’s reciprocal peer-to-peer lending system

  • The number of staff hours your institution could save thanks to RapidILL’s efficiency which is estimated to reduce by over 50% the amount of staff mediation need for borrowing and lending requests.​

  • The amount of time your users will save a year on waiting thanks to RapidILL’s average 12-hour fulfillment rate

Fill the following fields to get an estimation on your future savings with RapidILL
